# value(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the value of one of the properties, using an enumeration value instead of a property name.

## Declaration

```swift
func value(for component: Calendar.Component) -> Int?
```

## Discussion

The calendar and timeZone and isLeapMonth property values cannot be retrieved by this method.

## Accessing Calendar Components

- **setValue(_:for:)**: Set the value of one of the properties, using an enumeration value instead of a property name.
- **Calendar.Component**: An enumeration for the various components of a calendar date.
